title: Sold For Over $2 Million: A Draft, A Few Doodles And A 'Rolling Stone'
teaser: Bob Dylan wrote the lyrics for "Like a Rolling Stone" on the stationery of an old hotel in Washington, D.C. The working draft was expected to sold Tuesday at auction for more than $2 million.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
